message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $75?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about $65?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $72?
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about $68?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $70?
I'm really close to making a decision, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about $67?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I think we're at a stalemate. I'm willing to meet you at $69. That's the best I can do.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $68, but no higher. Can you accept that?
I've gone as low as I can, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $69. I think we're at a stalemate. If you're not willing to meet me at $69, I'll have to consider other options.
